metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000051 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Artifex Mupdf version 1.12.0 contains a Use After Free vulnerability in fz_keep_key_storable that can result in DOS / Possible code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable via Victim opens a specially crafted PDF.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.0+ds1-4').
